front.title: NIST Office of Weights and Measures (OWM) recognition program handbook, 7th edition

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: Handbook 143 provides the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) Office of Weights and Measures (OWM) performance standards and formalized procedures for the voluntary recognition of State legal metrology laboratories. This 2023 edition supersedes the 2019 edition.
